LanguageData.ATS.ToolPolicyInUse: Tool policy is in use by {0}.
LanguageData.ATS.TakeToInventoryColumnDesc: An amount of the tool to pick up extra when gathering it.
LanguageData.ATS.EquipDesc: Equip it as a main weapon. When checked on, pawns with this tool policy will go and equip it on their own.
LanguageData.ATS.EquipAsSecondaryWeaponDesc: Put in inventory as a secondary weapon. Useful when switching between weapons. If it's a melee weapon, it will be switched automatically when in a melee combat.
LanguageData.ATS.TakeAsToolDesc: Put in inventory as a tool. It will be picked up when going to relevant jobs.
